ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] LEHP!
ygData.msgSnippet: I primarily play a cleric, and yes, divine aura or the later on divine barrier, will prevent ANY spell affecting the cleric.. It will also protect against
ygData.messageBody:
I primarily play a cleric, and yes, divine aura or the later on divine
barrier, will prevent ANY spell affecting the cleric.. It will also protect
against melee damage and falling damage, but the cleric can still be
stunned... go figure :)

So yes, DA or DB will stop selos affecting the cleric, after the effect
wears off, ie the next pulse wont work

Qaelan
Cleric Extraordinaire
Solusek Ro
> friend FD, he dies reeeeally quickly. The cleric, seems I can't taunt off
> of him... and does DA keep bard song from hitting him - specifically selos
> :)
>
> Thanks!
>
> Tani "cleric killer" Kaat, 33rd Bardette
> Halana, 57th Shaman, tasty snack for Hoshkar!
> Paradigm
> Solusek Ro
>
